      • house

        public static Vector<Double> house(Vector<Double> x,
                   int j)
        Compute the householder vector of a given vector Complexity: O(sparsity(n))
        Returns:
        A vector with v(1) = 1 and (I - 2vv^T /v^Tv)x is zero in all but first component

        public static <N extends Number> TridiagonalMatrix tridiagonalize(Matrix<N> A)
